data.title: Our locations
data.text:
Set up in May 2018 the CEG Digital office in Amsterdam is centrally located at WeWork close to the University of Amsterdam and the Amstel river. This office is the home to all CEG – Digital staff based in The Netherlands, the majority being from the marketing and recruitment teams. We support all CEG-Digital partners and serve our online students based all around the world.

Head Office is home to CEG's central service functions, including our Executive team and is located close to the City of Cambridge and also to the train station in Cambridge, making it easy to get to via public transport.

Our regional sales operation is located in Beijing, the capital city of China. With a dedicated local sales team, marketing team, customer support function, and a service team in this office, we are determined to provide a premium service to our students through multiple channels in their own language, Mandarin.

Our office is in the Central Business District area of Beijing at Rooms 2111-2112, Taikang Financial Tower, No. 38 East Third Ring North Road, Chaoyang, Beijing.

Our regional office in Dubai, UAE is located in Dubai Knowledge Park, a sophisticated and central hub for education and a wide range of business sectors. It is easily accessible via the metro or tram.

We have our Dubai business development team based here, ready to service the Middle East region and beyond. We support our local partners with knowledge in ONCAMPUS Centres, programmes and help to start students on their study journeys.

Our Global Recruitment Hub is located in the heart of Hong Kong by the Victoria Harbour. It houses various teams, who work closely with our Head Office teams, in supporting our global recruitment team and the partner agent network from agent onboarding to student applications to commissions payments.

CEG Korea is located in Gwanghwamun in Seoul. This is a quiet and peaceful area in a busy city and currently 2 sales members are based in Korea. Korea office recruits students for ONCAMPUS UK, EU and USA and has been operated over 10 years in Seoul and we’ve built a strong relationship with agents in Korea.

Head Office is home to CEG's central service functions, including our Executive team and is located close to the City of Cambridge and also to the train station in Cambridge, making it easy to get to via public transport.

Set up in February 2022 the CEG Digital office in Newcastle is located in the city centre. This office is home to all CEG Digital staff based around the Newcastle area with the majority being from the sales team. We support all CEG Digital partners and serve our online students based all around the world.
